alert.note: Alert for McKean; Potter; Tioga; Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 8:30PM EST until January 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 15 inches, with the greatest amounts over Warren County. Ice accumulations of up to a tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph Monday afternoon. * WHERE...McKean, Tioga, Warren and Potter Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy snow tonight and areas of blowing snow Monday could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission strongly encourage motorists to heed all travel restrictions and delay unnecessary travel as significant winter weather conditions will make travel very hazardous. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
